Welcome to SK1. My name is [**Barney**](https://www.sk1.us/p/about.html) and I am a certifiable ski instructor.

I believe you should live like there is snow tomorrow and that the best things in life are freeze. Also when you wake up every morning you should carve diem. 

When I am not skiing I like reading about skiing, watching skiing videos, and snow dancing so I can go skiing.

![][image1] Read about Vermonts amazing ski [**areas**](https://www.sk1.us/p/areas.html).

![][image2] Stay up-to-date on the latest snow **[conditions](https://www.sk1.us/p/conditions.html)**.

![][image3] Follow me on [**Threads**](https://threads.net/sk1.us) for posts on snow, skiing and stuff.

![][image4]

Read [**about**](https://www.sk1.us/p/about.html) me and some of the places I have skied.

Snow long, I hope to ski you again soon\!
